Title: Rigodon
Writer: Erik Matti (story), Layette Bucoy (screenplay), Dwight Gaston (screenplay), Shugo Praico (based on a screenplay by)
Actors: Yam Concepcion, John James Uy, Max Eigenmann, Dante Ornedo
Plot: Sarah who just got out in a failed relationship. Finds a man named Riki who is a product of a reality show and currently finding his way to the top. The two develop a relationship which benefits each others needs.
